props.name: aria-label
props.description: Used to set the `aria-label` on the `role="tablist"` element. Either aria-label or aria-labelledby must be provided.

props.name: aria-labelledby
props.description: Used to set the `aria-labelledby` on the `role="tablist"` element. Either aria-label or aria-labelledby must be provided.

props.name: children
props.description: The content of the component, can contain Tabs, Panels but also content before and after Tabs and after the Panels.

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the tab container, used to generate child ids.

props.name: defaultTabIndex
props.description: The 0-based index of the tab that is selected by default when the component is loaded.

props.name: selectedTabIndex
props.description: The 0-based index of the tab that is selected.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback fired when the tab container changes (bubbles, cancelable): fired on `<tab-container>` before a new tab is selected and visibility is updated. `event.tab` is the tab that will be focused and `tab.panel` is the panel that will be shown if the event isn't cancelled.

props.name: onChanged
props.description: Callback fired when the tab container changes (bubbles): fired on `<tab-container>` after a new tab is selected and visibility is updated. `event.tab` is the tab that is now active (and will be focused right after this event) and `event.panel` is the newly visible tab panel.
